dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HJ 20 IH: Providing for congressional disapproval under chapter 8 of title 5, United States Code, of the rule submitted by the Department of Energy relating to “Energy Conservation Program: Energy Conservation Standards for Consumer Gas-fired Instantaneous Water Heaters”.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Palmer (for himself, Mr. Burlison, Ms. Letlow, Mr. Collins, Mr. Weber of Texas, Mrs. Bice, Mr. Moore of Alabama, Mr. Ogles, Ms. Tenney, Mr. Fulcher, Mr. Bergman, Mr. Crenshaw, Mrs. Fischbach, Mr. Hurd of Colorado, and Mr. Baird) submitted the following joint resolution; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce

form.official-title: Providing for congressional disapproval under chapter 8 of title 5, United States Code, of the rule submitted by the Department of Energy relating to Energy Conservation Program: Energy Conservation Standards for Consumer Gas-fired Instantaneous Water Heaters.

section.text: That Congress disapproves the rule submitted by the Department of Energy relating to Energy Conservation Program: Energy Conservation Standards for Consumer Gas-fired Instantaneous Water Heaters (89 Fed. Reg. 105188 (December 26, 2024)), and such rule shall have no force or effect.
